WITHOUT LIMITING THE GENERALITY OF THE FOREGOING, BY USING THE CODE, THE USER AGREES THAT THE FOLLOWING REGULATIONS AND RESTRICTIONS SHALL APPLY:

- In this License, (a) the "Code" shall also mean: source code, binary forms, and any other recognized terminology associated with code. (b) "User" or "Viewer" shall mean: any individual who, directly or indirectly, personally or through a representative acting on their behalf, including any non-human entity of any kind, seeks to utilize or is utilizing the code. (c) the "Use" shall mean the use by the User/ Viewer.

- The License does not grant any right of distribution or redistribution.

- There will be no use in Code other than viewing, with or without modification.

- The Code is subject to the restrictions set out in the documentation.
